definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

sentences.english: They are employed by telephone and other telecommunications transmission services establishments.
sentences.chinese: 他们受雇于电话和其他电信传输服务场所。

sentences.english: Painters were hired to try and blend the huge, obtrusive towers into the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 受雇的画家尝试着将突兀的巨塔融入周围的风景之中。

sentences.english: In fact, it is the principle of electrical resistance that is employed by electrical heaters.
sentences.chinese: 其实，这是原则，是受雇于电器电阻炉。

sentences.english: The men were employed to look after Masoud's tomb.
sentences.chinese: 这些人受雇照看马苏德的坟墓。

sentences.english: So, that is the story of how I came to rejoin the ranks of the employed.
sentences.chinese: 以上就是关于我怎样再一次加入到受雇者行列的故事。

sentences.english: Of course, the 33-year-old Kerviel isn't employed at Société Générale.
sentences.chinese: 当然，今年33岁的凯维埃尔不再受雇于兴业银行。

sentences.english: The worker bargained his services to the highest bidder.
sentences.chinese: 讨价还价后这名工人受雇于出价最高的雇主。

sentences.english: Nothing in this by-law shall apply to any person who is in the employment of the Company.
sentences.chinese: 本条的条文不适用于任何受雇于公司的人。

sentences.english: They confessed that employed in non-Mount extension tribe.
sentences.chinese: 他们供认，受雇于非芒延族人。

sentences.english: Your mind and various emotions are employed as the mediators between the two.
sentences.chinese: 你的心智和各种不同的情感受雇于二者间的调停角色。

sentences.english: He usually is a very loyal employee but occasionally he lies down on the job.
sentences.chinese: 他通常是一位很忠实的受雇者，但偶尔也会玩忽职守。

sentences.english: During my summer vair conditioner I was employed in the air conditionercounting depcreative artment of a Chemicing Company.
sentences.chinese: 在寒假时代，曾受雇于某化学公司会计部。

sentences.english: This Regulation shall apply to every seafarer employed under a crew agreement.
sentences.chinese: 本规例适用于每一名根据船员协议受雇的海员。

sentences.english: The Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer (MGM) hired him in 1937 as animation director.
sentences.chinese: 纳受雇于米高梅制片公司，当动画片制作人。

sentences.english: Crooks-for-hire will infect a thousand computers for $7.
sentences.chinese: 受雇的坏蛋只给7美元就可以感染1000台电脑。

sentences.english: Keys: 1. He's employed on house repairs.
sentences.chinese: 他受雇从事房屋维修工作。

definition: service (work done for money)/services (as in "goods and services")
to act jointly/to form a partnership
